title: Top Speaker Not Working - Pixel 3a XL - Phone purchased almost a year ago - Please Help
content:
I purchased Pixel 3a XL as a replacement of iPHONE and it has been a year now, a week ago my Top Speaker has stopped working,.
All other sound functions are running well in speaker mode, I can hear sound of the videos and music as well,
When i call or i receive call i can not be able to hear anything however the person on the other side can hear me clearly
I called for google help and they gave me project schedule to address this problem around 19 days and with no back up device offered in return as well.
In a way this is frustration so if any one have any suggestion to address this issue which is proven please provide the same (I tried clean the cache and other basic things so please excuse those solution guys and try to provide genuine and  proven problem)
